name: Abaddon
skill: Deals 1058/1298 DMG to all enemies. Decreases targets' speed by 45/55% for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon whose name also refers to a bottomless pit in Hell. She normally works as gatekeeper to the place where the most evil spirits are locked away in Hell. But no one's been coming lately, so she got really lonely and decided to leave. The machine she rides in is powered by some hellish form of science and can track and capture in addition to just zooming around. Once you get grabbed, it carries you straight back to Hell.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Defeat LVL 60, 70, 120, 140, 170 Commodore Perry [Demonic].
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Random drops after LVL 60.
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Get a Second Half Ranking of 2501~5000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Increases the total Event Points by Small during the "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" event.

main: "If you ever get locked up in Hell, we can be besties!"
skill: "I invite you to the pits of Hell."
limit_break: "Now all the rogues and hoodlums will be mine, all mine!"
